title: RBI grants white-label ATM licence to Mumbai-based EPS
description: Mumbai-based EPS is backed by investors like the UK's Apis Partners and Dutch Entrepreneurial Development Bank FMO. The licence has made it the country's fifth white-label ATM operator alongside Tata Communications Payment Solutions, India1 Payments, Hitachi Payment and Vakrangee. The RBI had last issued this licence in 2014 to India1 Payments. Earlier, three other companies had surrendered their licences.
